name: Corpulent Cadaver
aura: Increases Ally DEF in All Battles by 15%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Inflicts additional damage if this Champion is under a [Shield] buff. The damage is equal to 30% of the value of the [Shield].
skills.name: Crushing Mass
skills.books:

Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 20% of their MAX HP for 3 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Disgusting Display

Level 2: Shield +5%
Level 3: Shield +5%
Level 4: Shield +5%
